
#Angular Service - Cache: KBA (practical-guide-keys) Guide

#Goals:

#Procedure:

##To Enable Service - Cache:

	ngx-cache

	https://dev.to/maurogarcia_19/client-side-caching-with-angular-2i6l

## Angular Cache / Evict:
	https://angular.io/guide/service-worker-config
	In the meantime, the user's browser decides to evict lazy-chunk.<lazy-hash-1>.js from its cache. Browsers may decide to evict specific (or all) resources from a cache in order to reclaim disk space.
	
	
##

LocalStorage

private cache = {};
const cacheResponse = this.cache[req.urlWithParams] || null;
